ygData.subject: Re: War/New Factor
ygData.msgSnippet: Let s get the big picture here, guys. Its not about who wins or loses, its about how many bots die, and so far more Maximals are down than Alliance bots... And

Let's get the big picture here, guys. Its not about who wins or 
loses, its about how many bots die, and so far more Maximals are down 
than Alliance bots...

And anyways, the Alliance gestalts are adding some power, but not too 
much. Remember, it takes five bots to make a gestalt, so instead of 
five bots, you have 1 big one. While the big one is stronger, the 
five normal ones can also do alot of damage.

::FZ/Prowl/Perndabot/Repressor/Grimmer::

FZ recieves Iron Raptor's transmission, not bothering to reply to it 
as he angles upward to follow Prowl, who had grabbed Perndabot and 
was now flying upward. He aims his missile launcher, firing a glowing 
missile at Prowl.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl hears Iron Raptor's thoughts, replying to them as he flew 
through the air. Perndabot had grabbed him at the same time that 
Prowl had grabbed Perndabot, and now both bots were flying upward.

<I'm doing fine, love-NOT AGAIN!> Prowl adds as the missile explodes 
under him, the energy field draining both Prowl and Perndabot of 
their energy. Prowl falls out of the air, his boosters cutting off. 
Without enough strength to hold on, he and Perndabot seperate in the 
air, plummeting toward the ground.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ swirls to avoid his energy field, smiling as he sees Prowl and 
Perndabot plummeting toward the ground. It probably wasn't good 
draining the Alliance bot too, but he needed to do it to get the 
Maximal.

FZ dives, flying after Prowl. The energy from Iron Raptor's attack 
hits all three, speeding up the powering of Prowl's and Perndabot's 
systems slightly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler kicks Repressor away from him, turning to find a new target. 
He fires two shots from his rifle at Manterror.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@h...> wrote:
> (Well, we'll just se about that... The Alliance will fall, or at

Holidays!)
> 
> Hysteria/Tavatron/Rion
> 
> Hysteria rolled to the left this time, and caughtthe tail end of 
> Obliteratron's attack. She let out a yelp as she became airborne, 
and landed 
> several yads closer to the CF. This wasn't going to work. She 
wasn't capable 
> of damaging Obliteratron! Hysteria watched as the shields 
fluctated, they 
> wouldn't hold much longer. She ran across the plains and inside the 
CF, 
> skidding across the floor as she made her way to (wherever Chordate 
is):
> 
> <to Chordate>"What's our status?"
> 
> *****
> 
> Tavatron flipped forward this time, over Scattershot's weapon's 
fire. She 
> couldn't keep doing this, there had to be someway to take out that 
flying 
> slag! She sent to waves of energy at him, one from each end of the 
staff. 
> The first was aimed at his head, the second at his propulsion 
system.
> 
> *****
> 
> Rion fell to the ground with a loud *thud*. He lay there for a 
moment, 
> catching his breath. He was so glad to see her! He couldn't believe 
it! She 
> was here, now, on the planet!!
> 
> "I'm *gasp* glad to see you too!"
> 
> He climbed to his feet, balanced, and looked at Diana with that 
little hint 
> of mischief in his eyes that meant he was up to something. He ran 
at Diana, 
> and playfully tried to tackle her, like they used to do when they 
were 
> supposed to be practicing basic self-defense:
> 
> "Betcha can't pin me!"
> 
> >Scattershot flew forward, firing off twenty-five explosive rounds 
at
> >Tavatron, the energy blast striking him in the left side.  He 
slowly
> >descended, but his mind clicked, and he ignored the pain because 
he was
> >psychotic.
